name: 梁又文
objective:
本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions
